info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:28PM CDT until July 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Macoupin County in southwestern Illinois... Northwestern Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Divernon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Virden, White Oak, and Farmersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
